name: GRUB N Canterbury
short_description:
GRUB N Canterbury, we can be called it openGNC,

How to use grub N solve canterbury problem?

we see that the Canterbury is joint archlinux, debian, gentoo, opensuse, grml, etc...
and the now we can install multiboot for multi Linux systems operating on one PC by boot loader, and if possible fuse GNOME or others Desktop screen change mix together with grub N, then change the Linux Version, so easy changing the Linux same like changing the Desktop Screen in GNOME or others,but the Linux must be with the same Desktop system.It's maybe needs very great RAM，or we can choose very big swap disk to solved this problem.
